mapper.select: select u.u_username,s.s_limitDate,st.st_name,s.s_generateDate,s.s_connectTeacher,ss.state_id,ss.state_name,s.s_id,s.s_subjectUploadPath,s.s_subjectName,sms.ssm_fkstate from t_user u inner join t_studentmiddlesubject sms on u.u_id = sms.ssm_connectStudent inner join t_subject s on sms.ssm_connectSubject = s.s_id inner join t_subjecttype st on s.s_fksubjectType = st.st_id inner join t_subjectstate ss on sms.ssm_fkstate = ss.state_id where u.u_id = #{u_id} and (s.s_generateDate > #{beginDate} and s.s_generateDate < #{endDate}) and s.s_fksubjectType = #{subjectTypeId}
mapper.update: update t_studentmiddlesubject set ssm_fkstate = 2 where ssm_connectStudent = #{u_id} and ssm_connectSubject = #{subjectId}
